ABOUT: Working currently as Full Stack Developer, love to solve problems   ❤️
I always try to give a minimalist approach, creating websites with a simple and clear design. I also love to redesign existing websites.
“I consider myself a person who achieves what he sets out to do, since I believe that achievements are the results of the decisions that are made“
